rules_text:
Flash
When Stardust Haze enters, exile target nonland permanent you don't control until Stardust Haze leaves the battlefield.
Reflect {2}{W} [i]({2}{W}: Create a token copy of this enchantment, except it's a 1/1 Wonder creature in addition to its other types. They both lose reflect. Reflect only as a sorcery.)[/i]
